We are delighted to announce the 2020 **winners** of our annual [RGS-IBG GIScience Dissertation Prizes](https://geoinfo.science/dissertation-prizes/). The prize is awarded to the **best postgraduate dissertation** in geographic information science in the UK and Ireland.

To reward the exceptionally high quality of nominations given the constraints imposed by the pandemic, we have decided to award three prizes of equal value (in alphabetical order):

![](https://geoinfo.science/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/mahfouz.jpg?w=200)

**Hussein Mahfouz** (University College London, CASA), _Prioritizing Road Segments for Investment in Segregated Cycling Infrastructure: A Methodological Framework_ [\[github\]](https://github.com/Hussein-Mahfouz/Bicycle-Network-Optimization) [\[see pdf\]](https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FHussein-Mahfouz%2FBicycle-Network-Optimization%2Fblob%2Fmaster%2FPaper%2FDissertation%2520Final%2520Draft.pdf&data=04%7C01%7Cs.desabbata%40leicester.ac.uk%7C56987abd15b941ab467908d8bb81608b%7Caebecd6a31d44b0195ce8274afe853d9%7C0%7C0%7C637465512955525323%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C2000&sdata=Gtzsn4nTt0tu2QeZquT94A%2B5NOo2HI6VUUDZvlmTNLw%3D&reserved=0)

![](https://geoinfo.science/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/leo_mccarthy.jpg?w=429)

**Leo McCarthy** (University of Liverpool), _Spatio-temporal analysis and machine learning for traffic speed forecasting_ [\[see pdf\]](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/348578965_Spatio-temporal_analysis_and_machine_learning_for_traffic_speed_forecasting)

![](https://geoinfo.science/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/harriet-renton.jpg?w=399)

**Harriet Renton** (University of Leicester), _Using a Centrality Based Road Network and Other Explanatory Variables to Predict Annual Average Daily Traffic (AADT) for Major and Minor Roads in City of Leicester_ [\[see pdf\]](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/348786993_Using_a_Centrality_Based_Road_Network_and_Other_Explanatory_Variables_to_Predict_Annual_Average_Daily_Traffic_AADT_for_Major_and_Minor_Roads_in_City_of_Leicester)

The RGS-IBG GIScience Research Group congratulates these students for their excellent research work!
